props.border: Puts a border on the alert. Accepts **top** \| **right** \| **bottom** \| **left**.
props.closeIcon: Change the default icon used for **dismissible** alerts.
props.closeLabel: Text used for *aria-label* on **dismissible** alerts. Can also be customizing globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).
props.color: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). You can find list of built in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).
props.coloredBorder: Applies the defined **color** to the alert's border.
props.dark: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).
props.dismissible: Adds a close icon that can hide the alert.
props.elevation: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).
props.height: Sets the height for the component.
props.light: Applies the light theme variant to the component.
props.maxHeight: Sets the maximum height for the component.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the component.
props.minHeight: Sets the minimum height for the component.
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the component.
props.mode: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation [for transition modes](https://vuejs.org/v2/api/#transition).
props.origin: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation [for transition origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).
props.outlined: Makes the background transparent and applies a thin border.
props.prominent: Displays a larger vertically centered icon to draw more attention.
props.text: Applies the defined **color** to text and a low opacity background of the same.
props.transition: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/styles/transitions) or one your own.
props.type: Specify a **success**, **info**, **warning** or **error** alert. Uses the contextual color and has a pre-defined icon.
props.value: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
props.width: Sets the width for the component.

slots.append: Slot for icon at end of alert.
slots.close: Slot for icon used in **dismissible** prop.
slots.prepend: Slot for icon at beginning of alert.

functions.toggle: Toggles the alert's active state. Available in the close slot and used as the click action in **dismissible**.
